sub_title: Senior Projectmanager bij de Nationale Politie
summary:
Vast experience in organizational, financial and technical challenges in the design of lange complex building projects in the Netherlands and abroad. 

I am open minded pragmatic, result-driven and initiate to get things moving. My approach can be characterized as analytical, logical and project based. My leadership style is motivational, advisory and challenging to my team. I am optimistic, ambitious and persistent in getting things done. I keep a clear overview, ensure measurability in progress and have the necessary management, technical and financial insight and skills to get complex problems solved. 

I can be contacted directly by phone: +31646245443 or by e-mail marcel.ijsselmuiden@gmail.com or see my portfolio: www.ysselmuiden.nl

profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager development. 
Leading projects from preliminary design into realisation phase with a team of internal and external professionals.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Partner (dga) of EGM architecten (140 employees 2013), jointly responsible for strategic company policy. Member of the management team, innovation initiator, motivator and change driver (Introduction of new design tools, work processes, quality control system, financial rolling forecast system and employee and knowledge development schemes). As a business unit leader reporting directly to the board, I was responsible for 5 million euros annual turnover and approximately 200.000 m2 of annual real estate design. Also responsible for project structuring, sales and negotiations, budgets and budget control and responsible for leadership and process control of project teams consisting of project architects, project coordinator, draftsmen and supporting staff up to 20 fte team size. Projects are characterized by their size and complexity mainly in health care environments within the Netherlands and abroad.
profile_positions.title: Partner / Manager / dga

profile_positions.description: Board member of Dutch Health Architects (joint venture company, owned by EGM architecten and dJGA architecten and engineers) responsible for management and financial control, negotiations and contract management, operational and project structuring, resource allocation and planning of international projects. Jointly responsible for approximately 300 % growth in 3 years. Turnover 2015: 1.4 million euros design of over 90.000 m2 of health care real estate design. Reporting directly to the shareholders.
profile_positions.title: Director

profile_positions.description:
Project Manager responsible for design management and coordination of a vast array of primarily health care facilities. Direct leadership and responsibility project teams consisting of project architects designers, and integration of consultant input from external parties such as mechanical, electrical and structural engineers, landscape architects, interior designers and artists but also technical specialist on medical equipment integration. Responsible for the client and user interaction in the design process and construction budget control and on time delivery and quality control.
Responsible for contracting of under consultants and project related negotiations, commissioning of building contractors, and permitting. Responsible for total annual turnover average (EGM commission) 1,4 million euro's.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Panagro Project Development developed mainly housing complexes for the construction company Panagro.
As Project Manager my work involved the development of feasibility studies, financial models, yield calculations, municipality consultation on permitting and building status and coordination of external consultants and architects.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
Cepezed is known as one of the most influential innovative architectural design offices in Europe. Major innovation in the building industry often comes from parts and product suppliers. To ensure direct contact with R&D departments and to ensure a short supply chain, Cepezed introduced an entity making this possible by directly contracting product suppliers early in the design phase to participate in design and design innovation and to build without a building contractor. 

My responsibility included selecting, negotiating and contracting suppliers, organizing design participation of these companies in building design, managing the construction process up to and including moving in.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Building cost specialist, calculation of the multi designer housing complex Java Eiland in Amsterdam.
profile_positions.title: Construction Cost Specialist
